reviews.review_msg: David is the best prof ever. He is funny, smart and definitely wants his students to succeed. He helps you understand the rules in french and always provided an entertaining class. If have him as a prof, you are in for a treat! (And a good grade, granted you put the necessary effort in)
Class was fun and wasn't all that difficult, but she doesn't really do a good job in describing at times.
what a sweet sweet woman! she doesnt speak english very well and she marks pretty hard, but she trys very hard to help you understand.
